chat_history.message:
Hello, my iPhone 13 has the following issue:

I haven't received the invoice yet. The receipt of payment says 'This document is not valid for tax purposes -'. I need to receive the invoice with urgency, thank you

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

The customer is requesting an invoice for his purchase.

You should provide it within 24 hours after the purchase by the customer.

If it is not provided, we will proceed with a refund of 20% of the value spent, up to a maximum of €50.

Regards,
Angela from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

I have attached the invoice in this message, do let me know if the customer still requires any other assistance.

Regards,
CH

Dear Backcare,

You can ignore my previous message and the attached invoice as it was sent in the wrong language. I have attached the new updated invoice in the correct language. I apologise for any inconvenience caused. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
